errors.noLaunchUrl: Could not launch workload, workload missing a launch URL.
errors.undeployError: Error while undeploying workload. Please try again later.
errors.noRunningWorkload: Workload is not running. Can't open workspace.

displayName.label: Workload name
displayName.placeholder: Provide a memorable name for your workload

containerImage.label: Container image
containerImage.tooltip:
The name of the container image that will be used for this workload, 
 with possible registry host and version tag included. You can change this to override the default image.
containerImage.formatError: Container image name format is invalid, please check the syntax

imagePullSecrets.label: Image pull secrets
imagePullSecrets.tooltip:
Image pull secrets to use for this workload. 
 This is required if the container image is hosted in a private registry.

resourceAllocation.belowRequiredWarning: You are assigning resources which is below the recommended value. The workload may not run as expected.
resourceAllocation.exceedsQuotaWarning: You are allocating more resources than your project's guaranteed quota includes. If the cluster is busy, your workload may be preempted or remain in a pending state for an extended period.
resourceAllocation.belowRequiredExceedsQuotaWarning: You are assigning resources below the recommended value and exceeding your guaranteed quota. The workload may not run as expected and could be preempted if the cluster is busy.
resourceAllocation.belowRequiredTooltip: The resource is below the recommended value
resourceAllocation.exceedsQuotaTooltip: The resource is exceeding the guaranteed quota
resourceAllocation.belowRequiredExceedsQuotaTooltip: The resource is below the recommended value and is exceeding the guaranteed quota
resourceAllocation.label: Customize resource allocation
resourceAllocation.systemMemory: Amount of system memory (RAM) per GPU
resourceAllocation.cpuCoreCount: Number of CPU Cores per GPU

deploymentStatus.deployingMessage: This workload is being deployed. You can wait for it to be completed or close this window and check the status from the workloads view.
deploymentStatus.readyMessage: The workload has been deployed successfully. You can now access it from the link below.

undeployModal.title: Undeploy workspace
undeployModal.description: Are you sure you want to undeploy this workspace? Data stored in the persistent workspace storage will be accessible when you deploy it again.
